articles.title: Google loses monopoly case to Fortnite maker Epic Games - BBC.com
articles.description: A jury found that the tech giant used illegal strategies to maintain its app store dominance.
articles.content:
By Suranjana TewariBBC News
Hundreds of millions of people access gaming apps through Google's Play Store
